entry.title: WIND WARNING , Kananaskis (Nakiska Ridgetop)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:24 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low zero.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. A few flurries near the British Columbia border overnight. Amount 2 cm near the British Columbia border. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70 increasing to 60 gusting to 90 early this evening then diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. A few flurries near the British Columbia border in the morning. Amount 2 cm near the British Columbia border. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. High plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 9.

entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023
